    • setModal

      public void setModal​(boolean isBasic, LeaderCard card, javafx.stage.Stage modal)
      Description copied from class: GuiController
      Sets modal for the basic and leader production
      Overrides:
      setModal in class GuiController
      Parameters:
      isBasic - true if it's a basic production
      card - leader card (can be null if basic production)
      modal - modal

      private void goToPayment()
